mapper.select: SELECT room_equipment.equipment_id,room_equipment.equipment_num,equipment.equipment_name FROM room_equipment,equipment WHERE room_equipment.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id AND room_equipment.room_id = #{roomId}

SELECT `user`.user_id,`user`.user_name,department.department_id,department.department_name FROM `user`,department, meeting_user WHERE meeting_user.user_id = `user`.user_id AND `user`.department_id = department.department_id AND meeting_user.meeting_id = #{meetingId}
